column2: "[What] [has happened?]"

"[Lord Roga!]
[You] [returned to your senses!]"

"Seems the gamble paid off. You should
be grateful you dragorii are so tough.
Be grateful for me, too, while you're at it."

"[Clever] [ARKS]
[What] [have you done?]"

"We eradicated the residual D-arker
corruption by applying photon energy."

"Though when I say "we," I mostly
mean my associate here."

"Shame the process involved so much
collateral tissue damage, but, well... You
lot are quick to recover anyway."

"[Photons]
[Your] [ARKS] [power]"

"But don't think we've solved all of
your problems just yet."

"You'll be seeing a lot more dragorii
go berserk in the coming days."
"[What] [do you ask of me?]"

"That you hear us out. This conversation
is vital to both of our people."

"[I am] [En of the Hi tribe]
[What] [is your name] [ARKS?]"
"I am Aki. That's Wright, my assistant, and..."

"[<%me>]
[Forgive] [my rudeness]
[I give you] [my thanks]"

"[You returned to us] [Lord Roga]
[Hi'En] [will not forget] [this debt]"

"〔ロガ様！〕
〔……正気に戻られましたか！〕"

"賭けではあったが、上手くいったな。
龍族の肉体が頑強な事を誇りたまえ。対処が早かったのも良かったと見える。"

"〔賢しいアークス〕
〔何をした〕"

"簡単な話だよ、龍族。
内部にいたダーカーの組織をフォトンが滅したのさ。"

"もっとも、大半は私ではなく
<%me>くんのおかげだけどね。"

"怪我は如何ともしがたいが、それはまあ、龍族は治癒も早い。
時間が勝手に癒やすだろう。"
"〔……アークスの力か〕"

"おっと、龍族のキミ。安心するのは早い。
これはただの始まりだぞ？"
"これからも同じようになる龍族はどんどん増えていくだろう。"
"〔……我らに〕〔何を求める？〕"

"話をさせてほしい。
龍族とアークスとの間に必要なのは、対話だ。"

"〔我が名は〕〔ヒのエン〕
〔名を聞こう〕〔アークス〕"
"私の名はアキ。助手のライトに……"

"〔<%me>……〕〔無礼を詫びる〕
〔そして〕〔感謝を〕"

"〔ロガ様を〕〔救いし力〕
〔その恩を〕〔忘れはしない〕"
"A Scientist's Quandary"
"Chapter 4: The Dragorii Disease"
"The scientist's state"
"第４章 龍の病"
